0.01.name: wordpress/gn-xml-sitemap
0.01.description:
This is a Beta release. If you find a bug or you have a feature request, feel free to mail the developer.

In order to have your website included in Google News, you will have to suggest it for inclusion first.

Some features:

  • Set default values on a dedicated settings page
  • Set genre, access, language on per article basis
  • Exclude articles from the sitemap
  • Ping Webmaster Tools when sitemap is updated

Google News related questions? Find answers in the Google News Help Forum
